SELECT seL.MEM_ID, seL.MEM_CODE, seL.NAME, seL.NRIC, seL.CODE_NAME, to_char(sel.c1,'dd-mm-yyyy') C1, seL.C2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY seL.MEM_CODE ASC ) ROW_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ord.MEM_ID MEM_ID , ord.MEM_CODE MEM_CODE , ord.NAME NAME , ord.NRIC NRIC , sys13.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , ord.JOIN_DT C1 , CASE WHEN ( ord.MEM_TYPE IS NOT NULL ) THEN ord.MEM_TYPE ELSE 0 END C2 FROM ORG0001D ord JOIN SYS0013M sys13 ON ord.MEM_TYPE = sys13.CODE_ID WHERE ( 1 = ord.STUS )
AND ( ord.MEM_CODE = #{MEM_CODE} )
AND ( (CASE WHEN ( ord.MEM_TYPE IS NOT NULL ) THEN ord.MEM_TYPE ELSE 0 END) = #{MEM_TYPE})
AND ord.JOIN_DT = to_char(to_char( #{JOIN_DATE},'dd/mm/yyyy'))
AND UPPER(ord.NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{MEM_NAME})||'%'
AND UPPER(ord.NRIC) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{NRIC})||'%'
) seL ORDER BY seL.MEM_CODE ASC

SELECT seL.MEM_ID , seL.MEM_CODE , seL.MEM_TYPE , seL.NAME , seL.FULL_NAME , seL.PASSWD , seL.NRIC , seL.DOB , seL.GENDER , seL.RACE , seL.MARTL , seL.TEL_OFFICE , seL.TEL_HUSE , seL.TEL_MOBILE , seL.EMAIL , seL.SPUSE_CODE , seL.SPOUSE_NAME , seL.SPOUSE_NRIC , seL.SPOUSE_OCPAT , seL.SPOUSE_TEL_CNTC , seL.SPOUSE_DOB , seL.EDC_LEV , seL.LANG , seL.BANK , seL.BANK_ACC_NO , seL.SPONS_CODE , seL.JOIN_DT , seL.RESIGN_DT , seL.TRM_DT , seL.RENEW_DT , seL.AGRMNT_NO , seL.BRNCH , seL.STUS , seL.SYNC_CHK , seL.RANK , seL.TRNSPRT , seL.PROMO_DT , seL.TR_NO , seL.CRT_DT , seL.CRT_USER_ID , seL.UPD_DT , seL.UPD_USER_ID , seL.MEM_IS_OUT_SRC , seL.APLICNT_ID , seL.BIZ_TYPE , seL.HSPTLZ FROM ORG0001D seL WHERE seL.MEM_CODE = #{COLL_MEM_CODE} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT sL.ACC_ID code_Id , sL.C1 code_Name , sL.ACC_DESC, sL.ACC_CODE FROM ( SELECT sys01mt.ACC_ID , sys01mt.ACC_CODE , sys01mt.ACC_DESC , sys01mt.ACC_CODE || ' - ' || sys01mt.ACC_DESC C1 FROM SYS0001M sys01mt WHERE ( 1 = sys01mt.ACC_STUS_ID )
AND ( 1 = sys01mt.IS_PAY_CASH )
AND ( 1 = sys01mt.IS_PAY_ONLINE ) AND (sys01mt.ACC_ID IN (102 , 105, 497 , 107))
AND ( 1 = sys01mt.IS_PAY_CHQ )
AND ( 1 = sys01mt.IS_PAY_CRC )
) sL ORDER BY sL.ACC_CODE ASC
